topic.title: How to Select a Language (DITA and CSS)

body.p: There are two ways to switch the labels to a specific language for the DITA Map PDF - based on DITA & CSS - WYSIWYG transformation type:

ul.li: Alter the DITA maps and/or topics to have the xml:lang attribute set to the root element, to one of a supported value (i.e. "fr", "en", "de").
If changing the files is not an option, you can alter the value of the transformation parameter default.language to the desired language code.
